original_text: He stops the ideas of clever people. They cannot do what they want to do. He stops the ideas of clever people.
korean_text: 하나님은 교활한 자의 계교를 꺾으사 그들의 손이 성공하지 못하게 하시며

sentences.original_text: He stops the ideas of clever people
They cannot do what they want to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신이 하고 싶은 것을 할 수 없다

sentences.original_text: He stops the ideas of clever people
